channel.title: 459, the best times!
channel.description:
I'll be editing this post throughout the day. Please don't hate. Basically, I'm trying to carry on from where PJA stopped. I would appreciate any help that people are willing to give. Creating a playable, enjoyable server is my goal. Media [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=IDIP8RhkoAs]The new Sheep shearer - YouTube[/url]
Just created an imgur account. All pictures can be found here: [url=http://imgur.com/a/2TTky]http://imgur.com/a/2TTky[/url]
Client download: http://uppit.com/l1p2rowv6g96/Client.rar
Here, are the current features; Features
Npc Loading [ul] [*]Spawning [*]Good Combat [*]Walking [*]Clipped Walking [*]Clipped Following [/ul]
Combat [ul][*]Npc Combat [*] Following [*] Facing [*] Clipping [*] This monster is already in combat [/ul]
Player Combat [ul][*] Clipped Following [*] Facing [*] 1v1 [*] Multi [*] Skulling System [/ul]
Banking [ul] [*] Item saving [*] Noting support [*] Storing & withdrawing (1,5,10,X,All) [*] Re Arranging with saving positions [*] Deposit Boxes [/ul]
Trading [ul][*] Anti-Dupe System [*] Confirm screen [*] Offering & Removing (1,5,10,X,All) [*] Other players available inventory slots [/ul]
Music [ul][*] Music in certain areas [/ul]
Quest points [ul][*] Adding points up when quest is finished [/ul]
F2P Quest Progress [ul] [*] Black Knight's Fortress [*] Cook's Assistant [*] Demon Slayer [*] Doric's Quest [*] Dragon Slayer [*] Ernest the Chicken [*] Goblin Diplomacy [*] Imp Catcher [*] The Knights Sword [*] Pirate's Treasure [*] Prince Ali Rescue [*] The Restless ghost [*] Romeo & Juliet [*] Rune Mysteries [*] Sheep Shearer [*] Shield of Arrav [*] Vampire Slayer [*] Witch's Potion[/ul]
Members Quests Finished [ul] [*] 100% Lost City [/ul]
Mini-Games [ul][*] Fight Caves [*] Fight Pits [*] Duel Arena [*] Pest Control [*] Castle Wars [*] Warrior's Guild [*] Barrows [*] Barbarian Assault [/ul]
Skills [ul] [*] Agility [list] [*]Influence how long you'll be able to Run. [*] Failing Obstacles [*] Restoring Your Energy [*] Gnome Agility Course [*] Skullball [*] Agility Pyramid [*] Penguin Agility Course [*] Barbarian Outpost Course [*] Brimhaven Agility Arena [*] Monkey Agility Course [*] Wilderness Agility Course [*] Werewolf Fetch Game [*] Yanille Agility Dungeon [*] Dorgesh-Kaan Agility Course [*] [*] Gaining Tickets [*] Rewards [/list] [*] Construction [list] [*] Stat-Boosting Items [*] Servants [*] Flatpacks [*] Gardens [*] Parlours [*] Kitchens [*] Dining Rooms [*] Workshops [*] Bedrooms [*] Skill Halls [*] Games Rooms [*] Combat Rooms [*] Quest item.title: 459, the best times!
item.dc:creator: @Haxafer Haxafer
item.description:
@Haxafer wrote:

There was an error with the client, I’ve fixed it now and there’s a new client download. I hope to see you on

Read full topic

item.title: 459, the best times!
item.dc:creator: @Skillerpk Skillerpk
item.description:
@Skillerpk wrote:

downloading now
EDIT: it has been connecting to update server for a while now…

I’ll be editing this post throughout the day. Please don’t hate.
Basically, I’m trying to carry on from where PJA stopped. I would appreciate any help that people are willing to give.
Creating a playable, enjoyable server is my goal.
